RTSP (RTSPU, RTSPT): partialOnly WMA files are playable by foobar2000 through an RTSP connection. RealMedia, AAC, etc. are not supported.
Podcasting: partial3rd party plugin for 0.9 allows reading RSS 2.0 feeds as playlists. No subscription/automatic update features.
yesPresent in version 3.0 currently going through Alpha Testing.
partialAs of 0.9.2 it allows reading RSS as podcast source. Issues if links in RSS do not point directly to playable media. Automatic update of podcasts available.
